verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Unto thee, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, will I call <S%H7121><s%>: My rock <S%H6697><s%>, be not thou deaf <S%H2814><s%> unto me <S%H2790><s%>; Lest, if thou be silent unto me <S%H4911><s%>, I become like them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>, when I cry <S%H7768><s%> unto thee <S%H5375><s%>, When I lift up my hands <S%H3027><s%> toward thy holy <S%H6944><s%> oracle <S%H1687><s%>.

Draw me not away <S%H4900><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, And with the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>; That speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with their neighbors <S%H7453><s%>, But mischief <S%H7451><s%> is in their hearts <S%H3824><s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> them according to their work <S%H6467><s%>, and according to the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of their doings <S%H4611><s%>: Give <S%H5414><s%> them after the operation <S%H4639><s%> of their hands <S%H3027><s%>; Render <S%H7725><s%> to them their desert <S%H1576><s%>.

Because they regard <S%H995><s%> not the works <S%H6468><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Nor the operation <S%H4639><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%>, He will break <S%H2040><s%> them down and not build them up <S%H1129><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Because he hath heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and my shield <S%H4043><s%>; My heart <S%H3820><s%> hath trusted <S%H982><s%> in him <S%H5826><s%>, and I am helped: Therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> greatly rejoiceth <S%H5937><s%>; And with my song <S%H7892><s%> will I praise him <S%H3034><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is their strength <S%H5797><s%>, And he is a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%> to his anointed <S%H4899><s%>.
Save <S%H3467><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, and bless <S%H1288><s%> thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: Be their shepherd <S%H7462><s%> also <S%H5375><s%>, and bear them up for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
